00214 inline Statistics Statistics::operator+ (const Statistics& statistics) const
00215 {
00216     Statistics temp;
00217 
00218     temp.backgroundReferenceGrayLevelFindingTime_   = this->backgroundReferenceGrayLevelFindingTime_    + statistics.backgroundReferenceGrayLevelFindingTime_;

00225

00287 inline void Statistics::backgroundReferenceGrayLevelFindingTime (const double& time)
00288 {
00289     backgroundReferenceGrayLevelFindingTime_ = time;
00290 
00291     preprocessingTime_ = backgroundReferenceGrayLevelFindingTime_ + optimalThresholdComputingTime_ + noiseRemovalTime_;
